entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
